description:
Hauk & Owens provides effective and efficient legal representation to businesses, individuals and families. Located in Quincy, Illinois, our law firm serves west-central Illinois and northeast Missouri.

We offer a variety of services in different areas of the law, including business and commercial law, personal injury, family law, criminal defense, drainage law, real estate, estate planning and personal asset protection. However, we are not a general practice law firm.

Each of our experienced attorneys focuses on specific practice areas, allowing us to maintain a current and in-depth knowledge of the law that will serve you well as our client. Our significant legal knowledge is just one tool we use to deliver the foremost legal representation. We also offer our clients the benefit of cutting-edge technology, extensive resources and personal attention from our team throughout the duration of their cases.

When you need to exercise or defend your rights and interests — either in the courtroom, at the negotiating table or through preventative measures — look no further than Hauk & Owens. We are prepared to help you address and resolve your legal challenges effectively and efficiently.

To discuss your legal concerns with one of our skilled lawyers, call 217-919-9251 today and schedule your free initial consultation.
